pr_title: Crash in instruction step and version checker not calling issue handled

timeline.message:
1.Crash in instruction step handled
2.VersionChecker not calling issue fixed

timeline.bodyText:
should WCP be a variable?
Not sure what role it is playing here
timeline.author: zohrehj

replies.bodyText: Yes, it is required. That particular variable is to determine which server, the application is calling and based on that we're handling headers. In this case it's calling WCP server api.
replies.author: naveenr-btc

replies.bodyText: I see. This is serverType. From what I can see serverType should be an enum instead of string, but that can be added in a separate PR.
replies.author: zohrehj
